comment.author: Kara
comment.text: "It was from a you tube video". Hillary Clinton....lying to not only America but to families sitting in front of her and flag draped caskets behind her. Followed by, "What difference does it make!!?!" when questioned on her lying by Congress.

replies.author: Tristan
replies.text: Rather have a liar than a lying rapist.
